recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, tomatoes, onions, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.steps: 1. Boil spaghetti. 2. Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil. 3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 4. Stir in tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve over spaghetti.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, curry powder, onions, garlic, ginger, coconut milk, tomatoes, cilantro, salt, pepper
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. 2. Add chicken and cook until browned. 3. Stir in curry powder and tomatoes. 4. Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 25 minutes. 5. Garnish with cilantro and serve.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients: Broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil, rice
recipes.steps: 1. Cook rice. 2. Stir-fry garlic and ginger in sesame oil. 3. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. 4. Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. 5. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, sugar, butter, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract
recipes.steps: 1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Whisk in eggs, milk, and vanilla. 3. Melt butter in a pan. 4. Pour batter into the pan and cook pancakes until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.ingredients: Avocados, lime, cilantro, red onion, tomatoes, salt, pepper
recipes.steps: 1. Mash avocados. 2. Mix in lime juice, cilantro, red onion, and tomatoes. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Serve with tortilla chips.
